subject: Bruces Mini Box on Ebay
author: psfponies
full_text:
Looks like the same people who were bidding on the RS hacks are 
bidding on Bruces Mini Box. Guess they got the EVP bug! The bids up to 
$257.00 (reserve not met yet)

I do have a question for you Bruce you state in your ad "THIS DEVICE 
RETAILS FROM THE MANUFACTURER FOR 499.00"

Which model Mini box is this I only see two on the site one for $399 
and the crystal enhanced for $449.

Kay
